Python Modules¶

From the Legacy Review, the following modules appear to be part of HamCalc.

  1. radio – Radio Engineering
  2. ham_ops – Ham Radio Operations
  3. electronics – General Electronics
  4. construction – Construction including Plumbing, Electrical and Masonry
  5. math – Mathematics and Physics including Unit Conversions
  6. navigation – Navigation and Astronomy
  7. calendar – Calendrical Calculations
  8. audio_photo – Audio and Photography
  9. software – Software Engineering, including ASCII codes and other algorithms
  10. other – Other, including finance and nutrition

math¶

Programs include the following:

  • accelr
  • binary
  • conecalc
  • decibel
  • deciconv

  • equiv
  • fibon
  • formulae
  • graphs
  • involute
  • numderiv
  • polygon
  • primenos
  • propcirc
  • randnum
  • simuleq
  • solutri
  • speedtd
  • trig
